urlLink Me not sleeping on the job

urlLink Well, lets think about that, Criminals, don't obey laws. hmm, so all law abiding citizens will be without a means of protection, wile the criminals,the very ones that should not have them, are out reeking havoc on the world. and you think crime is out of control now!? "Guns don't kill people, people kill people"
urlLink "I know I can do it." Todd Downey said helping himself to another ear of corn from the steaming bowl. "I'm sure, in time, her death will be a mystery even to me." (Secret Window)

la la lalalalalalalala I wrote her off for the tenth time today, And practiced all the things I would say, But she came over I lost my nerve, I took her back and made her dessert, Now I know, I'm being used, That's okay man cause I like the abuse, I know she's playing with me, That's okay cause I've got no self esteem, We make plans to go out at night I wait till 2 then I turn out the light, All this rejection's got me so low If she keeps it up I just might tell her so, When she's saying that she wants only me, Then I wonder why she sleeps with my friends, When she's saying that I'm like a disease, Then I wonder how much more I can spend, Well I guess I should stick up for myself, But I really think it's better this way, The more you suffer, The more it shows you really care Right? Now I'll relate this a little bit, That happens more than I'd like to admit, Late at night she knocks on my door, Drunk again and looking to score, Now I know I should say no But that's kind of hard when she's ready to go, I may be dumb But I'm not a dweeb I'm just a sucker with no self esteem. (Offspring) - "Self Esteem"
urlLink This is what I did today.
urlLink "This old guitar taught me to sing the love song" (john Denver)
urlLink Thank god for peep holes
